body: An undead creature with the ability to enter a rage gains the morale bonuses from rage despite being immune to morale effects. The bonus to Constitution from the rage applies to an undead creature's Charisma instead.
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Vampires/Example Vampires/Vampire Savage/Vampire Savage/Special Abilities/Undead Barbarian
name: Undead Barbarian
